title: YouTube is finally getting rid of this annoying feature and that's great for us
description: YouTube announced that the site will be doing away with those annoying banner ads that take up video space.

title: The yellow iPhone 14 is dividing people but I know where I stand
description: We unboxed, touched, examined, and shared the yellow iPhone 14 and got a lot of feedback.

title: The Nothing Phone 2 may lose out to flagship rivals in one key area
description: The Nothing Phone 2 isn't expected to use Qualcomm's top-of-the-range Snapdragon chipset.

title: The ReMarkable 2 just became the best laptop for escaping the internet hellscape
description: The ReMarkable 2 tablet finally has a keyboard accessory – and that could turn it into the ultimate distraction-free laptop for minimalists.

title: Star Wars Eclipse: everything we know so far
description: Star Wars Eclipse is official, and it's being made by Quantic Dream, developers of Detroit: Become Human and Heavy Rain.

title: Some Sonos speakers will finally support Apple Music's Dolby Atmos tracks
description: The Sonos Era 300, Sonos Arc and Sonos Beam Gen 2 will at last support Apple Music Spatial Audio.

title: Slack is the latest app to get ChatGPT integration
description: OpenAI's chatbot is moving into the business world, and Slack is the latest to make use of its potential.

title: ExpressVPN's Lightway protocol passes second audit with flying colors
description: In a continuous effort to transparency, the VPN provider shares the results of the 12th third-party audit conducted in the last 12 months.

title: Wix users can now collect debit card payments on iPhone
description: Business owners using Wix can accept secure contactless payments anywhere in the US with Tap to Pay on iPhone.

title: The standard iPhone 15 may lack two of the iPhone 14 Pro’s biggest features
description: The iPhone 15 and iPhone 15 Plus won't feature ProMotion technology and always-on display functionality, reports suggest.

title: Fujitsu's follow-up to mighty supercomputer chip will power data centers
description: New chip dubbed MONAKA will succeed the potent A64FX, which drives one of the most powerful supercomputers, but its focus is different.

title: Sea of Thieves update: Season 8 Adventures, Plunder Pass, and more
description: Here's all the latest Sea of Thieves update news from Rare.

title: Atlassian is the latest tech firm to axe jobs
description: Despite “massive opportunities” ahead, Atlassian’s co-CEOs and board have agreed to cut 5% of its headcount.

title: The yellow iPhone 14 is here – and we can't decide if it's awesome or awful
description: Apple unveils a new Yellow iPhone 14 but does not bring the sunny color to iPhone 14 Pro and 14 Pro max

title: Sonos officially launches Era 100 and Era 300 speakers – here are the details
description: All-new multi-room speakers finally unveiled, confirming Bluetooth and USB-C line-in, plus Dolby Atmos Spatial Audio support for Era 300.

title: Europol topples major DoppelPaymer ransomware operation
description: Europol and FBI take on operators behind DoppelPaymer ransomware variant, arrest warrants issued for three more individuals thought to be involved.

title: Warning: AMD graphics driver bug could brick your Windows 11 PC
description: Windows gamers with AMD GPUs need to be aware of a rare bug that corrupts the system.

title: Microsoft’s CEO calls Alexa and Siri ‘dumb’ – but ChatGPT isn't much smarter
description: Microsoft’s CEO calls Alexa and Siri ‘dumb’ – but he’s wrong about ChatGPT being the answer.

title: This malicious Word doc doesn't even have to be opened to infect your PC
description: Previewing the file is enough to have the threat actor run code remotely.

title: Skins will be cheaper in Halo Infinite season 3, but it could come at a cost
description: 343 Industries have introduced many changes to Halo Infinite for Season 3, but it seems like the shop has had the most significant overhaul.

title: It looks like the PS5 shortage is finally over
description: You may not have any trouble buying a PS5 anymore, as a surge in console sales in the UK suggests the shortage is done.

title: Google's Wear OS will soon look a lot more like Apple's watchOS
description: Google's new Wear OS guidelines for apps show it wants a more consistent and polished look for your smartwatch.

title: Microsoft wants there to be no escape from OpenAI in your business
description: Microsoft’s Copilot will write your emails, handle your post-call summaries, and more across Dynamics 365 business apps.

title: A VR Game Pass might be coming to your Oculus Quest 2, but it's not what we wanted
description: Meta might be working on an Oculus Quest 2 software subscription model, but it's not quite what we were hoping for.

title: A two-year-old Windows flaw is being exploited in new phishing campaign
description: Hackers are abusing a flaw in UAC to deliver a known remote access trojan.

title: OnePlus 12: what we want to see
description: Everything we know so far about the OnePlus 12, along with what we want to see.

title: Samsung’s next affordable Galaxy phones may not be so affordable
description: All three of Samsung’s next Galaxy A Series phones could cost more than their predecessors.

title: PC sales might be even worse this year than first thought
description: IDC expects PC sales to slump this year, in light of macroeconomic challenges and shrinking demand.

title: The iPhone 14 might get a new color option today
description: Another source has suggested that a new iPhone 14 color is coming soon, and we might see it today.

title: Lots of laid-off tech workers are starting their own businesses
description: Laid-off tech workers have started their own businesses and they feel “excited”, “confident”, and “optimistic”.

title: Ghosted looks like the funny Apple TV Plus movie that will finally make you sign up
description: The Chris Evans and Ana de Armas-starring comedy thriller might be Apple TV Plus' most enticing movie yet.

title: Anyone can now use Outlook free of charge on macOS
description: Outlook is free to all, including those without an account, and it integrates with all the latest macOS features.

title: Huawei P60: latest rumors and everything we know so far
description: The Huawei P60 series is likely to land in March , and we've heard a lot about some of these phones.

title: These popular VPN routers are being hacked to spread malware
description: Two models of popular SMB routers are being abused to deliver HiatusRAT, researchers warn.

title: Quordle today - hints and answers for Tuesday, March 7 (game #407)
description: Looking for Quordle clues? We can help. Plus get the answers to Quordle today and past solutions.

title: WhatsApp is ready to help most of you silence annoying spam calls
description: Latest Android beta lets you control which calls make it through as part of new approach for maintaining privacy.

title: Microsoft delivers Windows 11 ‘Moment 2’ update - and these are the best new features
description: Microsoft is not letting things cool and pushes ahead with further integration of Chat GPT into Windows 11.
